invocation.name: Library of the Hyn-Aerlori I
invocation.description: Protects one book, scroll or other object with recorded information from discovery. Grants a bonus to the Difficulty to find the item equal to one half the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Light of Uhla I
invocation.description: Priest can see in the dark as if they had a perception of one tenth the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Wisdom of the Shea-Al-Aecor I
invocation.description: Gives the priest insight into the proper course of action in a moral quandary.

invocation.name: Althea's Lamp II
invocation.description: Blesses a lamp with some of the attributes of Uhla. Those who are questioned in the light of Althea's Lamp must make a will check to avoid telling the truth. If they fail by 10 or more, they cannot remain silent.
